name: Startup Jobs Italia
description: This is a free, niche job board for the Italian startup community. It was inspired by a similar website in Norway that I used to land my first tech gig in 2019.
alt: Screenshot of the Startup Jobs Italia homepage.

name: Confex
description: A multipage website for one of Scandinavia's leading course providers. Based on UI mockups provided by the client, I led the frontend development of the site with support from two fullstack devs. This project was managed by my previous agency, Fullstakk Marketing.

name: CTRL + CSS
description: When Covid hit Norway and we were placed into lockdown, I decided to spend four hours replicating my Macbook Air keyboard with HTML and CSS. Apple never offered me a job, but I did break 100k+ impressions on Twitter!
alt: Screenshot of a pink Macbook Air keyboard rendered entirely with CSS.

name: Layover In Italy
description: This was my first JavaScript game, and it provided an excellent foundation for manipulating the DOM. I was inspired by Ania Kubow’s tutorial during the #100DaysOfCode challenge, and I’ve been active on tech Twitter ever since.
alt: Screenshot of a blog about Italy.
